Package net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ButtonListener
    Interface that is used to implement the buttonPressed method that will be called every time that a specific Button is pressed.
    FrameListener
    Interface used for implementing what to do when a Frame has been resized.
    KeyListener
    Class that is used to listen for KeyEvents that occur whenever a key on the Keyboard is pressed, held down, released, or typed (pressed and then released).
    MouseListener
    Class that is used to listen for MouseEvents that occur whenever an event has occurred with the Mouse.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonEvent
    Class used for each Button Event that is dispatched.
    Event
    Base class for all of the other Events.
    FrameEvent
    Class that is used when a FrameListener has an Event.
    KeyEvent
    Class used when a KeyListener instance has an been notified of an event.
    MouseEvent
    Class created and passed along with any MouseListener Event calls.
